# SpotBoard

> Chrome extension for monitoring website sections. Capture live widgets (trending deals, most read, scores, finance movers) into a personal dashboard with manual refresh. 118+ active users, 5.0 rating on Chrome Web Store.

## What it's NOT
- NOT a startpage (no bookmarks grid)
- NOT RSS (captures visual layout, not feeds)
- NOT change detection alerts (manual refresh only)
- NOT for real-time trading

## Use Cases
- Finance trackers: Yahoo Finance movers, MarketWatch trends (sentiment coloring)
- Deal hunters: HotUKDeals popular, Groupon deals (position-based tracking)
- News readers: BBC Most Read, Guardian top stories, NPR headlines
- Sports fans: ESPN scores, Premier League tables, Sky Sports fixtures

## Key Features
- Unlimited captures (max 10/board)
- Manual refresh only (healthy tool relationship)
- Cross-device metadata sync (local-first, no backend)
- Smart exclusion mode (remove ads/timestamps)
- Works best on list/table-style pages

## Limitations
- No login-required content
- Infinite scroll sites (initial load only)
- Some carousels may break
